title: InternX
description: InternX is an innovative platform designed to simplify the process of finding the ideal internship for undrgraduates in the rapidly changing IT industry. The platform aims to bridge the gap between students and companies by providing a seamless and efficient approach to internship discovery and securement.

title: Explore Express
description: A website simplifies travel planning by offering personalized itineraries, interactive maps, a currency converter, and real-time weather forecasts that helps travelers create customized trips, manage finances, and stay informed about weather conditions, ensuring a smooth and efficient travel experience.

title: Lecture Hall Allocation System
description: A system to optimize lecture hall scheduling by assigning halls based on course requirements, student capacity, and availability of the lecture halls. This systm reduces conflicts and improves efficient management, offering scalability and ease of use for university administrators.

title: Library Management System
description: A Library Management System for R/B/Karagasthalawa Maha Vidyalaya to automate book management and improve efficiency through streamlined processes like book categorization, record management, and search functionality.
